name: Kubrick's Cube
description:
Kubrick's Cube

Perceiving fourth-dimension (time) as a three-dimensional cube. Move between different time periods by rotating through different sides of the cube. Play different stages of 2001’s story by controlling the characters in each era to advance in human evolution.

Controls

Arrow Keys/ Mouse = Rotate the cube

WASD = Control the characters of the corresponding cube face that the crosshair is aiming at

ESC = Restart

@Andyesign

The game is not optimised for browsers if you want the full experience feel free to download it or watch the play-through video.
